Interests:

Background:

Born and raised in Costa Rica. I've lived with 5 women all my life, moved to the States when I was 10, played competitive soccer until getting injured and having to pivot. Studied Human Evolutionary Biology at Harvard, interned in various Latin America countries most of my summers, did finance at Morgan Stanley until realizing I could have a greater impact using tech.

I'm not going to say I like solving complex problems or that I want to change the world. I'm just going to do it.
